* Dinobot stood steady as Tavatron leaned against him and the green glow 
faded from his chest-plate, his systems a little drained from the repair but 
it was worth it since it had saved her life.
He watched as she steadied her self but was caught off guard when she stared 
into his optics, he held her stare for a few nano-clicks but then looked 
away. It almost felt like she was searching again...but for what?! She had 
looked at him so many times like that and he had looked away, perhaps 
fearful that she WOULD find something there other then a warrior.
Dinobot snarled as he heard her thank him for saving her spark, he thought 
it nothing other then making sure that the Maximal force stayed at it's 
current number and would have done that to save any bot's life...or would he 
have done the same?
He pondered that question for a nano before coming to the conclusion that he 
wouldn't, he would have tried to come up with something other then his own 
repair system...or even nothing at all.
It almost bothered him to realize that he had acted upon instinct instead of 
pure calculated thoughts, since when had he just jumped into something 
without looking first?
Dinobot growled to himself, he had acted upon emotion and reflex...not logic 
and calculative planning. It bothered him...but as not as much as he had 
thought it would.
He then looked at the body of Mosquitor and spoke plainly and cold...*

" You were unwise to do such an act, I was protecting you as to avoid a 
situation such as this."

* Dinobot sighed but then looked back at Tavatron for a moment, hoping not 
to run into that searching stare again. The expression he wore was stern but 
a hint of relieved concern was present in his optics, but then suddenly his 
voice became so cold that it could have frozen a blazing inferno...*

" Further more, the next time that you pull a stunt like that again I will 
personally skin you alive!"

* Even though his words were cold his optics still showed concern, so his 
words were nothing but an empty threat...for now. But if Tavatron did so 
such a thing again he wasn't clear if he would do as he said or not, but he 
would cross that bridge when he came to it.
Dinobot looked back at the body of the defeated Predacon and sighed, at 
least his spark wasn't in his throat any longer.
The immediate danger had passed, but there was still a battle to win!
He then turned his gaze to his rifle as it lay upon the ground...*

" However, you are welcome."
